ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Any comments on the changes?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Verant! It s not even a minor nerf.  The ONLY people it really effects are the Team manaburn wizzys nuking Kunark dragons to death for their scales.
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "The Mad Macinchaote" <scendera@...>
>
> This is the second huge wizard nerf...cut it out,
Verant!

It's not even a minor nerf. The ONLY people it really
effects are the "Team manaburn" wizzys nuking Kunark
dragons to death for their scales. Outside of that,
it's harmless.


> As it is neither of my wizzies (Valynn, 46, Nameless,
> Mysticka, 17, Rodcet Nife) can find anything but >
a "pity group" from my guild. First you made us useless
> below 35 with the massive resist nerfs so we can't ?
>land a spell, and now this?

First off, if you can't find anything but a "pity group"
from your guild, that's a guild problem, not a game or
class problem.

Second, it doesn't affect you. Hell, it doesn't affect
anything but a very small percentage of raids or
encounters anyway.
